review_text: Great house!
Fantastic accommodations! Very comfortable and clean! Highly recommend!
great place clean and quiet

This house made us feel like home! It’s was so clean, so open, and so comfy! The host is so kind and understanding and very responsive! If we get the chance to come back to this area, we will definitely stay here again!
We will definitely rent again next time we are in town to visit our 1st grandchild. Home was clean and easy to access. Quick response from the owner if we had any questions.
The house has been one of my favorite airbnbs ever! Super welcoming and great location! Will definitely stay again in we visit the area again!
This was just place we needed for our traveling party.
Clean house, responsive host, overall a good stay.
Beautiful place with Beautiful neighborhood great place to stay again 10/10 recommended
if you are in the area and looking for a place, it does not disappoint. Would definitely stay here again.
The place was very clean and Brice was super responsive to any questions we had.
Very clean and cozy. Super comfy bed!!
Great place to stay!
Brice’s place was unique and clean. The beds were comfy and water was hot. There were a few issues but Brice was quick to respond and resolve them. I would stay again.
Brice has a wonderful place. Would highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in the area. Awesome entertainment area and very dog friendly. Thanks Brice for letting us enjoy your place!
Very nice home, great location and lots of parking. Would definitely recommend this as a great place to stay
Great place!

Brice was a great host and quick to respond if I had questions before or during my stay. This was a perfect get away. The home is close to town and restaurants. I greatly appreciated the ability to bring my dog with me. We felt right at home. It's always nice to arrive at an AIRBNB and find it just as you expected.
Great place. I have stayed several times for work.
Brice is a rockstar, the schoolhouse is beautiful and relaxing. Will definitely be stopping back
Great place to stay. Clean and quiet.
Great place to stay, already booked another stay.

We stayed here about a week ago. Brice was a great host. We had to check-out earlier and he was very helpful with adjusting the reservation. Location is ok. Property isn't fully fenced so if you have pets you'll have to walk them on a leash. The unit itself is decent. Comfortable beds and a lot of natural light comes in which was nice.
this is the most beautifull, clean, comfortable home on airbnb I've ever stayed at. the attention to detail on amenities and creature comforts like fluffy pillows and towels made my stay luxurious.

We had some of our work guys stay there it made it more like they were at home instead of in a hotel they really enjoyed it. Bruce is a great communicator and help walk us through the whole process 10 out of 10 would recommend.
It was very accommodating, and enjoyed the stay

I was in town for work and it was nice to come “home” to such a cozy and spacious place, instead of the usual hotels I stay in. I really felt at home in this cozy and clean house.
It was a nice change of pace for my chaotic on the go life! I thank you Brice for offering your residence for others to experience! Cheers
Very comfortable beds. Very nice place. Nice neighborhood.
Brice's place is great! Spacious and comfortable, with a super entertainment system. Brice is a great host - friendly, helpful, and accommodating.
Really good place host is really friendly and if you need anything he gets right on it I highly recommend this place.

Brice is a great host and very friendly. I recommend any one of their places to stay in Ft Morgan, and the area is convenient for visiting family. The Grant School is a neat place, especially the history behind it.
Clean spacious home! Great communication from host. Would stay again for sure!!

This was a very cool place to stay! Beautiful old building that’s comfortable and fun to stay in. All the furnishings were really nice and there was plenty of room for our family to stay comfortably. Parking is easy and it’s well located in Fort Morgan. Would highly recommend staying here to anyone!
Peaceful and beautiful. The animals made it even more memorable. Would highly recommend.
Awesome and beautiful farm! The tepee was cozy and clean. Would definitely stay again!
My boyfriend and I enjoyed our time away and it was very close to the wild life sanctuary. We enjoyed the farm life and will love to go back
This was such a nice place to stay! The owners are super sweet and accommodating and the ranch is beautiful
Very clean place. Great for a short, peaceful getaway.

We had an amazing stay! The tipi was so cute and peaceful. The fire pits, hammock, horse shoes and games provided gave us plenty of things to do. It was nice to get away and unplug. The porta potty was really clean. Already plan on staying here again.
Amazing place to stay! definitly one of the best clamping experiences I've ever had. the stars were amazing.

My husband and I stayed at Jeff’s teepee and we had the best time. It was easy to find and had everything we needed. The sky was beautiful and filled with stars, there were horses on the property, we felt like we had lots of privacy and enjoyed the cool crisp nighttime air as we slept.
Amazing stay, responsive hosts, exactly what you hope for from an AirBnB. Thank you guys!

Beautiful place
Secluded and peaceful
Easy to get into and the bedding smelled freshly washed.
The rain prevented us from staying the full night since we couldn’t heat the place up with the gas put inside the tent. But overall, we would love to come back and enjoy it during the summer! Horses and beautiful views all around!
What a unique and fun spot! Just as pictured and peaceful. Even though temps dropped down to 50 overnight it stayed surprisingly comfortable inside!
Great stay, would recommend this place to anyone!

We had a wonderful stay at this location. While a storm prevented us from being able to use the outdoor fire pit we were able to hang out on the hammock for a while before retreating inside. It was very cozy and the indoor fire pit was easy to use and kept us warm. It was comfortable and clean and very peaceful with the occasional sounds from the horses or roosters nearby. We definitely enjoyed our stay.

It was a perfect pick for a last minute overnight getaway to celebrate my wife and I’s 18th wedding anniversary. The campsite was clean, ready and exactly what we were looking for. This was definitely a hidden gem only 45 min from home. We will be back for sure!
As a bonus, I woke up early to hear the faint sounds of lions roaring in the distance. Yes, I forgot it would be close to the wild animal sanctuary in Keensburg. I felt like we were literally waking in Africa this morning. We had a good laugh and yes actual went to the sanctuary the next day to see who was calling! Just added a little more excitement to our TeePee glamping experience! Thank you Ted and Erica for everything!

Exactly as described. It even rained heavy on and off and it was honestly even better! The sound of the rain inside the teepee is magical.
I was worried about airplane/highway/work on the ranch noise being an issue but it was not at all. Perfect getaway. Would 10000% recommend and have already shared the unit listing with friends. Thank you for a perfect night.
Teds place was adorable and a great little get away from the city! Nothing will beat the sitting around watching the stars all night.

The place was beautiful and very relaxing. We were prepared for bugs & outdoors, not a big deal for us. We love the outdoors!
The winds were VERY high that night which caused issues with the tent. It wasn't tied down enough so began to lift and move from winds. We had checked weather before booking but didn't say about winds. Ended up sleeping in our car.
If you book, just make sure to check the weather.
Otherwise definitely recommend staying for the experience and how beautiful creation is at the place.

Really great experience, I'd like to come back. Beautiful location and a lovely teepee. During my one night there was an awesome thunderstorm but I was perfectly dry and warm in the bed.
A word of advice to travelers: the mosquitoes can get inside at night time, though they weren't too bad. Also, planes can pass quite close even in the middle of the night so light sleepers might want to bring earplugs.
Great place for the experience.
Very cute little teepee! Bring bug spray
Was a great little get away for a night!
Everything was awesome with the tepee. I would definitely stay here again. I do feel the cleaning fee is a bit high for only changing linens but otherwise a great place to stay
Was a wonderful weekend get away near Denver! Great way to escape! Very peaceful and relaxing and had everything listed
Such a beautiful space. So cozy and peaceful. The whole area that you’re given is everything you need to disconnect.

My 10 year and I came a night while visiting some friends. It was a great experience to sleep in a teepee. It was very clean, and the bathroom was spotless. My only wish is that there was another one, so my husband and older son could share in the fun.
Clean, easy to find, and exactly as described. Don't forget your bug spray!
A great escape. Very peaceful and relaxing. A neat experience to pass by all the hirses and get to spend the night in a tipi.
Such a fun unique place. Loved walking over to have my morning coffee with some horses

One of the most unique experiences I’ve ever done. It was so cool to stay in a tepee! The rain against the teepee made it all worth it despite the weather, along with an amazing lightning show after a sunset. Dozens of horses to pet nearby and it felt very welcoming. You get all sorts of nature sounds and a camping feel with grilling and a fire.
Gorgeous glamping experience. Wonderful bird and plane watching, cozy bed!
What a great experience staying in the tipi! Thanks for hosting us!
Nice and quiet property and we loved the surroundings. A very quaint fun get away. The bed was cozy, the bathrooms were clean. We enjoyed our stay.
We had a great time and would surely go back! It was a unique, peaceful stay. We ACTUALLY heard the lions. It was stormy and cozy. We felt safe inside, despite the weather.
Beautiful, private, clean, comfortable. We had a great stay!
Very cute place
Super fun

Deko ranch is located not far from Denver, but you’d never know it. We were surprised at how quickly the bustle of the city faded away, giving way to vast farmland, beautiful homes, lots of cows, and the last stretch of the drive was even on a dirt road (but well graded, easy for any vehicle). The ranch has easy signage pointing us to the teepee. We didn’t see the hosts, but the privacy was nice. We had our own little access to the creek, fire pit, hammock, and picnic table. The weather was perfect, even when it started raining after sunset. The patter of droplets on the canvas was so peaceful and we drifted off to sleep in the cozy bed.

Thank you for letting us stay! The place was very peaceful, relaxing, and beautiful! Erica communicated everything very well and made our stay easy! Definitely recommend this place for a nice get away!
Peaceful, great views, lots of birds and close to the Animal Sanctuary.
Great experience
This was an awesome get away. Super clean and check i neas easy and quick
Amazing stay!!!!! 10/10 would recommend beautiful place to disconnect
Great experience with my son in the teepee. Very clean with o issues at all. The ranch itself is amazing also.
Such a great place to stay! The bed was so comfy and clean! Loved visiting the wild sanctuary a few minutes away and hearing the wildlife at night.

My wife and I booked this teepee as a getaway from fast paced life for a minute and it was PERFECT. The view were breathtaking and the space was amazing! The hosts were very professional and were fast to respond to anything we needed. We will definitely be back!
Beautiful and peaceful

Great place to stay! It's super quiet and peaceful for a getaway that's truly away from it all, but so close to the city. We loved it here and wish we could have stayed longer. Everything was set up to be perfectly functional and super cute. Glamping at its best!
We had a great stay at the teepee! It was the perfect night to spend with my fiancé, relaxing and enjoying quality time together. The teepee is so cute and cozy, the perfect fall night.

This was such a unique and fun location to stay at! Communication with the host was easy and the response time was very quick. The directions to get there were detailed and easy to follow. We would definitely stay here again!
10/10 recommend…That this as your sign to book ASAP!! This stay did not disappoint! They have thought of evening you might need. The hosts were fantastic. We will be back!
Wonderful getaway from Denver for the night! Highly recommend!
The Teepee was very cute and the bed was quite comfortable. We enjoyed our time there.
Wish i had booked two nights. Its a fantastic location and a great night sky view!

We absolutely loved our stay at the tee pee! Highly recommended. The hosts were extremely gracious and quick to respond! They have thought of everything. BBQ, hammock, outdoor fire pit, indoor fire pit was the best addition, very clean bathroom with lights for night, tiki torches! We loved visiting the horses and enjoyed the stars. It is in the flight path of DIA so we did get some airplane traffic all night but did not deter our stay! The teepee is decorated so cute! Quick trip from Denver, it made for a perfect quick get away!
The Teepee had all the necessary to make the best of the experience. The gas grill was nice to cook dinner at sunset, surrounded by horses and cows. Great glamping experience!
Wish I could have stayed longer! Such a cool experience.

This was an amazing adventure 45 minutes from home, everything was amazing except the weather didn't want to play nice with us, fortunately there was games and a gas fireplace to keep us warm and occupied. My boys loved the trip and we all want to go back before it snows! Thanks DEKO Ranch.
awesome.
Everything you need for the perfect getaway. Enjoyed an evening fire in the fire pit. Sunset from the patio chairs. Morning coffee on the hammock. Truly a hidden gem.
Had a great stay
Booked this place for a night for my husbands birthday and we had a great time!

Erica was amazing! Súper communicative from the moment we got there! Exactly as advertised, they literally have all of the essentials for you (just basic stuff though, like a grill, plenty of wood for the fire, the cleanest porta potty I’ve ever been in AND you can wash your hands in a tiny built in sink) we did bring coolers with drinks and food. But overall it was a perfect dreamy romantic getaway. definitely booking again in the future ❣️
great!
Amazing stay!
A great quiet getaway.

Ted has an incredible property. You drive directly through the barn seeing all the horses and cows. We strolled through the barn area at sunset to say hi to the horses before coming back to start a fire and cook dinner. The teepee was spotless and cool at night. You will want some warm clothes late at night/early morning. Although it didn’t matter to us, the creek is very dirty and smelly. We discovered this after our dog tried to jump in. Overall, the stay was absolutely perfect!
We will be coming back. Thank you Ted!
Such an amazing stay! There was a really cool thunderstorm and a little bit of rain but it didn’t bother us at all. This is a very well built tipi!
We absolutely loved our stay! It was a very peaceful, clean, and exactly as advertised! Highly recommend.
cool place!
Super cute. Remote. Easy communication,
It was awesome!!! Very romantic!
Awesome place! Would love to stay here again!

This was a dreamy little getaway, and only about 30 minutes from Denver! The horses were so friendly, it was a total bonus to pet and love on them. The teepee was so cozy and perfect, and the stars at night were incredible. Would highly recommend this spot!

great getaway place for a quite glamping experience.
will definitely go back in the future
A beautiful place to stay and relax.
Place was lovely! So pretty! Bring extra clothes and blankets! Gets cold at night !

This place is amazing! A must for literally anyone in or outside of the area! With everything there you can stay busy all day! It was a breath of fresh air in and outside. This place had many accommodations that made the stay even better! I couldn’t be more happy with my decision of choosing here to stay! I recommend anyone who comes across this place to stay here!
Very nice place, at night we heard the horses around us and it was very pleasant.Highly recommended if you want to be in nature.
We had the most amazing night! Definitely gonna come back one day!❤️

Loved our stay. The camping coffee maker was a nice touch. The location is in the flight path to Denver airport but after a while, it kinda lulled you to sleep. Would definitely stay here again. Clean, cozy.
Neat place with good views - just don't forget the bug spray!
It was awesome! Lovely to wake up with the sun

We had a great time at the TP! We brought two pack n plays for our kids to sleep in and it fit them both perfectly. Great place for a day trip or a quick get away. The horses on the property were very friendly and the hosts were kind enough to let our kids pet them (several times).
There was a porter potty behind the TP which was very clean and convenient. No outlets of course so if you need a charger bring a portable one!

A slice of country heaven! This place is pure tranquility and nostalgic. I will absolutely be coming again.
Thanks for the opportunity to unplug!!

This was my second stay and I really enjoy it. You are definitely living in Indian country with some upgrades :-). The bed was soft and the indoor fire ring kept the teepee warm on a chilly night. I will definitely stay again.
Hosts were very kind and welcoming. Tipi was clean and cozy. Would recommend
This is such a special spot. Highly recommend for a relaxing trip to disconnect. Ted had everything we needed available. Don't forget layers and extra bug spray!

This was the perfect getaway for the night. It was such a peaceful and beautiful place. We loved walking around the horse farm and seeing all the horses. Everything we needed was there: clean bathroom, bonfire pit, grill, picnic table, Adirondack chairs, horseshoes and games and gorgeous teepee to hang out and sleep in. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a romantic and calming vacation in the country!
a lovely stay on a peaceful ranch.
Beautiful place to stay that’s tucked away near the back of his ranch. We really enjoyed the sunset from the patio and staying in such a unique place

I came here with my boyfriend for our five year anniversary and it was everything we hoped it would be. So quiet, magical and all around peaceful. The perfect getaway. Bugs were a minimum and cleanliness was 10000%. We will certainly be staying here again- worth every penny. Thank you so so much for a wonderful stay.
This place is beautiful! I highly recommend it!

We had an incredible stay in the teepee! Everything we needed, it’s incredibly quiet and we were serenaded by so many signing birds. Definitely a fun and unique glamping spot, perfect staycation for us!
Great place to stay and getaway for a bit! Absolutely beautiful, and such a wonderful experience! 100% recommend!
Amazing stay!! Beautiful location!! Loved everything about this place and it was exactly what we needed!!
Fantastic views, no better find for tranquility and nature, must stay!
The tipi was so wonderful we played games by the fire all night. Ted was super accommodating we highly recommend staying here!
Awesome spot! Lots to see!

This stay exceeded our expectations in every way. Undeniably the teepee is a very unique experience on its own, but there are so many personal touches to this stay that made it even better. The stargazing left us speechless. Best getaway we’ve had in a while!

We absolutely loved our stay in the teepee! It was so peaceful to get away from busy life and spend time in quiet nature. Lots of animals to be heard from the teepee. Ted is a great host and makes the stay very comfortable. We stayed plenty toasty in bed despite temperatures dipping into the 40s.
Amazing communication! Very fast responses and incredibly kind. I could not have asked for a better host.

We had a very special night at Creekside TIPI. Very quiet, peaceful, got to see millions of stars, you dont see in the city and heard nature you dont hear in the city. It was great. We will not forget are stay there. Thank uou to our host Ted & Erica.
A true “glamping” experience. We loved hearing the coyotes and enjoyed sitting outside to see all of the stars. This is an opportunity to “rough” it in a comfy bed.

We had a great time — just as described, clean, beautiful, and everything we needed was there. Full moon, bright stars, warm campfire, beautiful horses… An enchanting, quick, easy getaway/recharge. Highly recommend.
Excellent place to stay for a relaxing and peaceful weekend.
Great experience overall - loved waking up in a teepee with the sunshine overhead. We will be back!
Wonderfully unique place! We loved it!
Super quiet and peaceful. Gorgeous sunrise location and great amenities!!!
We loved our stay and enjoyed being on the horse ranch! The bed was cozy and loved the deck and fire pit! Wish the creek was not so dried up.

This is an amazing place to stay! Not only is the experience of staying in a teepee extraordinary, but it is such a great environment. Saying hi to horses and stargazing were the highlights of our stay! Ted was so nice and welcoming!
We absolutely loved our little staycation at Ted’s Teepee! Everything was just as described and we absolutely enjoyed the little firepit inside of the teepee!
Great place!
Really cool unique place, beautiful location and pretty convenient to the airport. We’ll certainly be back soon!
We loved our stay. It was clean, unique and absolutely a peaceful escape.
We had a great one night stay. My boys loved getting to see the horses and bulls. The accomodations were cozy and clean. Drinking coffee on the deck while the sun came up was wonderful.

Everything was great! Ted was responsive and kind. The place was in a great location and the pictures are a good representation of what the place is actually like. Fire inside was incredible, deck was great, and the fire pit outside with the picnic table was perfect. Overall, it was exactly what we were looking for in a night away and I will absolutely come back.
Awesome staycation
Such a wonderful couples get away! Great sunset and perfect for quality time together catching up and unplugging
Loved staying at this secluded teepee! It was super cute and clean! We enjoyed being able to look at the horses nearby and lounge on the deck. Would definitely recommend!

This was our first time staying in a tipi and it was amazing. Ted and Erica have created such a comfortable stay that you don’t even realize that you’re “camping”. You have everything you need and more. The horses and cows were close by so we made sure to pay them a visit. The farm is a perfect getaway. We wish we could’ve stayed longer!
Awesome little piece of paradise. Will stay again!
Gorgeous Property!

Great place to spend the evening, arrived very late and left very early in the morning and were accommodating. Very helpful and ready to answer questions. The teepee was in a great location far enough away from the owners house and the road. Very comfortable bed and place to spend the night.

The stay at the teepee was an amazing experience. We had such a relaxing and unique experience. Everything was clean and comfortable. The animals were all beautiful and every person we met was super friendly. We will definitely be back!
Need bug spray!
expect to have a good time

What a fun place to stay! The location was great, very quiet and secluded. It’s far enough away from owners home that you don’t feel too close. Loved hearing the animals and lounging on the comfy bed. They had a very clean portapotty behind the tipi so there’s not a long walk to the barn bathroom. Super fun!

The tipi was a super cool spot! It ended up being too warm for us to stay and would have been nice to have a fan of some kind. We knew we were signing up for "glamping" though! In the cooler months this would be an amazing and cozy spot! The hosts were great to communicate with and very understanding.
What a beautiful place! Wish we could have stayed longer. We will definitely be back.
Fun experience for one night.

Very unique and peaceful experience here. Comfortable bed, lots of amenities inside, and so cool to see the horses nearby on the property. We came in the summer so the little stream nearby wasn't really moving at all, but it was still a very relaxing atmosphere.
We loved our stay at the Teepee! It was great waking up with the horses and the birds. I would recommend staying at the Teepee!
It was so beautiful! Not far from Denver and a lot of other great attractions too.
We had a great time!! Coolest air bnb we’ve been to yet!!
AMAZING! We loved staying here and will be back again. Such a relaxing night !
Everything was great!!!! It’s not enough space for 4 ( was 2 adults and 2 kids) but if it 2 persons it very comfortable. Thank you
Everything as advertised the perfect peaceful getaway!!
Very peaceful. You are nowhere near anyone else camping or glamping. Loved the baby bull!
Magical glamping experience! Very peaceful and private atmosphere by the creek.

Ted’s place was great! It was 100 degrees when during our stay so if you’re staying in the summer, a battery operated fan might be nice to bring! Great location. Near stores, gas stations, restaurants, liquor store etc. stars were beautiful at night.
Gorgeous property & only 15 minutes to Barr Lake and Brighton. Sunrises and sets were our favorite parts. Can’t wait to stay again!

The teepee is set apart from the ranch so is very private, and looks amazing. The interior is as shown in the pictures - very instagramable! We didn't have enough firewood so Ted very kindly brought us more as well as extra gas for the inside fire. Having a campfire in the middle of nowhere was great, and we really enjoyed seeing the animals on the ranch.
The only downside of the teepee is that it has lots of places for bugs to get in - through the roof, the door, the floor etc, so we had loads of flies inside in the evening and in the morning we were woken up by mosquitoes buzzing around our heads. If you can mitigate the flies or they don't bother you then this is the perfect getaway :)

This was the greatest Airbnb we have ever stayed at!!!! It is so incredibly cool, Ted is super cool, and so are his animals. They had some baby cows when we stayed, as well as miniature horses. Can’t describe how fun it was to stay here. 1000/10
Cute little getaway spot close to Denver.

The teepee was really comfy inside and stayed surprisingly warm even on a colder, rainy night. The location on the farm is very serene and we would've definitely taken advantage of sitting around and enjoying it more if the weather had been drier. We enjoyed our stay and would recommend to others looking for a peaceful getaway that's only a short drive from Denver.
The reviews are true! Great place. Bring a battery operated fan if your staying during a hot week though.
This is a must! Such a unique place and worth every penny! Super clean and unique and great amenities!
Great relaxing weekend away!

Such a fun and unique place to stay. We went to the Wild Animal Sanctuary which is just a few minutes from the teepee and had a great time seeing all the animals! We enjoyed the outdoor firepit and star gazing as well!
I would recommend bringing a fly swat and a lighter for the amenities and the flys that are present during the day
The place was nice and quiet, everything was perfect. Would highly recommend staying there.
Super cute place. Thanks!
As advertised. Fun way to spend a night.

This ranch is simply beautiful. The teepee is very comfortable, and was almost like staying in a hotel. Expect your the only one there, very secluded. Our first time “glamping” and we highly recommend it!
Ted, Erica and DeKo Ranch are such a delight. The unique stay creates a great experience but the little details and touches the hosts gave to the space, along with the location are extremely special!
A true gem that allows you to truly escape - friendly hosts, elegant teepee, serene setting.
Great place to "glamp," exactly as described!
Love this property. The owners are super nice and accommodating. The animals are so cute, especially the cat! Loved sausage! I definitely hope to come back!
This place was absolutely fantastic! Our kids loved it and loved exploring the property. The teepee was plenty big for a family of four.

This was such a perfect get away. There are not amenities provided than you would expect. Bathrooms were very clean and felt even more open and relaxing than in the pictures. I would say to follow their directions to a T, as the GPS is not great at getting you there.

Such a wonderful experience! Cannot recommend this AirBnB enough. Very clean and comfortable and they even added a portapotty right behind the teepee so you dont have to wall to the barn. Potty was very clean no odor at all.
Such a great getaway place to stay! So beautiful and very clean!
Farm is a on cute! Loved all the animals.
Loved Ted’s teepee!!!!
Great place. Really nice area with a creek, bbq, and horseshoes. The bed was super comfy and warm.

Ted’s place was magical! What a fun way to get away from it all! We saw horses, cows, turtles, frogs, and so many different types of birds! It was very cool to be so close to nature without sacrificing comfort! The teepee was very comfortable and everything we needed was provided - even pre-cut fire wood! I’d highly recommend staying here!
This place was very unique than any other airbnbs. My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay.

It was very easy to get to. I was hoping we would get then sooner than we did but still I loved it. I didn’t know my phone wouldn’t have a signal so the only thing I wanted to ask for was the bbq lighter so I could light the gas heater in the tee-pee but I’m sure they would have responded if I could have gotten through.
My boyfriend and I sat outside to eat dinner and watch the sunset where I asked him to marry me and he said “YES!”
After dinner it got much colder and super windy. So we decided to head into the tee-pee. Luckily we were told to pack for the weather so I brought 2 comforters and a blanket. As we played Yahtzee we could hear the wind picking up but we were surprised we couldn’t feel a thing. By the time we woke up sleeping to the sounds of nature had been so relaxing but quite chilly in the morning so it was smart for us to bring the extra blankets. Thank you Ted for an overall really successful and perfectly enjoyable night.
Next time we will definitely have to stay a few nights instead of just one. 😊

What a fun, memorable experience this was! We very much enjoyed our night in the tepee. There were many little thoughtful touches-- from the twinkle lights to the extra sleeping bags. It DID get chilly overnight! We went in mid-October, so be prepared with warm clothes. Top notch destination for a little getaway!
Nice teepee behind horse stables to get away from the city and relax.

You absolutely must see this. The tepee is beautiful and incredible. A very unique experience that I’m glad is offered. Ted is great. Fast communication and very helpful. The animals on the ranch are cool to see as well.

Such a unique and beautiful experience! The teepee is charming, with all kinds of little special touches (candles, cards, fire pit, twinkle lights). Comfy bed. Very simple and clean with a great hygge vibe. Beautiful sunset and gazing at the gorgeous horses puts it over the top. Loved it!
Amazing place! Such a fun and different stay then anything else. Would highly recommend!
Wonderful time here! The bed was cozy and the tepee was beautiful!
Great stay for a couple!

A very unique experience! The space was quite large and stylishly decorated. Easy to find and pretty quiet (some plane noise at night but not bad). The port a potty was super clean. It was a cold night and got a little chilly once we turned off the gas fire pit but we had extra blankets with us. Beautiful sunset over the Rockies in the distance!
Such a beautiful open space farm with lovely horses roaming around
The teepee was amazing! Ted did a great job in providing driving directions and directions for how to operate everything in the teepee. My only complaint is that we only stayed there for one night!

The definition of peace & serenity. Sunrises at this farm are unrivaled. The creek, horses, and fresh air add to the calm presence of the stay. There is a warm fireplace in the teepee and board games which provides a fun detox from every day life. Definitely would recommend this experience!
This place is the perfect getaway from the city. We enjoyed meeting the animals, carving pumpkins, and watching the stars at night. The host was very hospitable and kind.
nice folks. thanks.
So beautiful!

Ted's place is amazing. The perfect way to spend a night outdoors without the hassle of having to pack up and set up your own camping gear! My wife and I spent our 4th anniversary here and love it. The Teepee is wonderfully cozy, the bed is comfortable, bbq grill worked great, etc. etc. Highly recommend!
